price: (den Weg) Allahs, Dessen ist, was in den Himmeln und was auf der Erde. Und wehe den Ungläubigen vor einer strengen Strafe!
arabic: ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۗ وَوَيۡلٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ مِنۡ عَذَابٖ شَدِيدٍ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: al-lahi alladhī lahu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wawaylun lil'kāfirīna min ʿadhābin shadīdin
